name: Balancing Rome
description:
This is a game where you have to keep the people of Rome from uprising in the up coming election. 

It doesnt explain in the game but it is enter to start and E to effect the buttons

this is a test game to see what we could do.

This is my first Game Jam so be as harsh as possible.

I did the coding and my friend did the art work. We used aseprite and Game Maker studio 2.
